name: Maze-Man
description:
This is a simple maze game. However - Oh No! You have only one attack. Luckily, your enemies are stupid. You can suicide, and they will follow you to their demise. There's also a "chill" mode, which just lets you play infinitely through different procedurally generated mazes. 

CONTROLS (IMPORTANT): 

Arrow keys to move

Escape to pause

K to kill yourself

E to end turn

R to respawn

Spikes disappear whenever something goes into one. 

Move to attack (if you have one left. Displayed by the sword icon. )

Move to collect coins and open chests. 

CREDITS

Procedural Generation was from a tutorial by kidscancode. All I added upon that is the items and enemies.
